feed.title: KrakenD Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • GH-Actions: save the generated artifacts in the cache by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/841
  • Pass the application context and the execution context to the modifieâ€¦ by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/848
  • Update deps by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/849
  • Update Dockerfile by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/845
  • Add a command to test plugin compatibility with the krakend binary by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/851
  • Fix move otel to metrics and traces register by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/854
  • Krakend OTEL by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/839

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.5.1...v2.6.0

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed typo in makefile target. by @arambau-wgfs in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/863
  • Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.32.0 to 1.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/860
  • deps: update go to 1.22.2 by @ALX99 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/870
  • Bump v2.6.1 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/866

New Contributors

  • @arambau-wgfs made their first contribution in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/863
  • @ALX99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/870

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.6.0...v2.6.1

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.6.3

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Go and Alpine versions by @arambau-wgfs in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/888
  • Bump github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/azidentity from 1.5.1 to 1.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/887
  • always stack the cache factory on the backend by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/891
  • Update deps for 2 7 by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/894
  • Bump github.com/hashicorp/go-retryablehttp from 0.7.5 to 0.7.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/893
  • set DNS Cache TTL time on startup by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/904
  • Add permissions to upload the security reports by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/905
  • Deps 2 7 updated libs by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/906
  • Release v2.7.0 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/902

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.6.3...v2.7.0
